answerText: Vita Sackville-West[10] Sackville-West was intimately involved with this other author who told the stories of six friends in The Waves and created character who turns down Peter Walsh to marry Richard.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 10 | 18 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This author wrote about the burning of Anstey and its effects on Walter, who has never loved his wife rose, in her novel Easter Party.  For 10 points each: [10] Name this author of the poem "The Land" and a work about Lady Slane's rediscovery of a man who once loved her, Mr. Fitzgeorge, in her old age titled All Passion Spent.
